actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

official_title: A bill to authorize funding for the carrying out of functions of the United States in connection with the Great Lakes Fishery Commission .
short_title: Vernon C. Applegate Great Lakes Fishery Commission Act of 1991

summary.text: Vernon C. Applegate Great Lakes Fishery Commission Act of 1991 - Authorizes appropriations to enable the Department of State to carry out its foreign affairs authority, function, duty, and responsibility in connection with the Great Lakes Fishery Commission. Expresses the congressional finding that an increased commitment to the Commission would increase the level of sea lamprey control.

titles.title: Vernon C. Applegate Great Lakes Fishery Commission Act of 1991
A bill to authorize funding for the carrying out of functions of the United States in connection with the Great Lakes Fishery Commission .
